name: The O.C. Supertones
description: '''The Orange County Supertones''' (a.k.a. '''The O.C. Supertones''', or simply '''The Supertones''') were a [[Christian ska]] band from [[Orange County, California]]. The band was signed to [[Tooth & Nail Records]] and its imprint, [[BEC Recordings]], before becoming an independent band. The band temporarily disbanded in 2005, reunited in 2010 to resume touring and recording, and permanently disbanding in 2017. The OC Supertones were one of the first widely successful Christian ska bands.
